name: Ghost Ship Escape -Horror Game
description:
How would you feel to meddle with a ghost? Here is your chance to mess with the most notorious ghost captain on a haunted ship.

You are stuck on a ghost ship commanded by the most wicked captain of the era. The captain roams around the ship searching for a living soul to hunt. Legends say that no one has dared to go inside the ship, ones who did never lived to tell the tale.

Now it’s you and the wicked captain on the ship. Keep a lookout for him and plan tricks to bring the captains reign of terror to an end. Keep in mind to run like the wind when you see the ghost or else the haunted face would be last thing you will see.

Prove your courage and make the captain regret messing with you. Are you ready to jump in this ghost ship? Once you are aboard there is no turning back.

Features:
• Thrilling Missions!
• Realistic haunted Environment!
• Great 3D Graphics!
• Realistic Explosive Sounds!
• Smooth and Easy Controls!
• Different Challenging tasks!
